Hey Nick,

> "HATEOS Describes Protocols" not "Hypermedia Describes Protocols". Why
> the switch? Freudian Slip? The former seems redundant and doubly
> obscure.

Eek! That's a pre-coffee typing error. HATEOAS is of course, the  
metamodel. Hypermedia describes the actual protocol.

> Looking forward to the book.

Thanks. I think there's going to be a slew of good books from the  
folks on this list (Subbu + Mike, Stefan).

Jim
